Key Match Events: Scotland posted 90/0 in a rain-shortened 10-over match with notable performances from openers George Munsey (41*) and Michael Jones (45*).
The match was called off due to excessive rain, resulting in both teams sharing a point each.
Pre-Game Insights: Scotland's captain Richie Berrington won the toss and opted to bat first.
Jos Buttler expressed excitement about having Jofra Archer back in the team and mentioned their strategy of going with extra pacers.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was held at Kensington Oval in Bridgetown, Barbados.
Rain interrupted the match multiple times, eventually leading to its abandonment.
Jofra Archer made his return to the big stage at his hometown, Barbados.
